title: You\'ve never responded to my questions before but here I go again at least trying.  There was a man tazed in the courtroom in NHC yesterday when he charged the DA.  What is the story behind that?
text:
Cpl.
J.J. Brewer of the sheriff's office said no one was tased.



If you witnessed this event, please provide more details, such as the
courtroom number, the time and the date. Also, since there are
multiple assistant DAs, the name of the DA.



Thanks.
